summary: Now you can bash your friend\'s head with this Balloon Hammer.
descriptionHtml:
Ever just want to- Ah forget it. <Insert long description in form of a funny advertisement here.>
Giant Maul. Unique. Playable. Not good against a swarm of enemies. Hang fun.
======================
Location
Dragonsreach. Just go to the throne and you should see it just laying there... Either that or it somehow flew into that pit of fire you see there, in which case, good luck. /:<
======================
Credits
SaberChewy - Making the esp.
Bethesda Studio\'s - Making Skyrim and the CK.
Giants - Making those giant stick things with huge rocks at the ends of them.
======================
Endorse if you want a longer description. =_=
======================
KNOWN ISSUES:
Yes, there is a hand that seems to want to grasp nothing at all under the maul. Not my fault. It was either that little clip issue, or you impale your foes through the stomach with a rock on a stick... Somehow, I\'ll find a way to deal with that little problem.
author: SaberChewy
